languages.text: "Это... крайне эксцентричная затея, Лорд-капитан. Идеально подходящая вашему титулу. Обязан предупредить, что на воплощение этой идеи уйдет немало времени... и средств. Вы уверены в своих намерениях?"

traits.locale_text: "Это... крайне эксцентричная затея, Лорд-капитан. Идеально подходящая вашему титулу. Обязан предупредить, что на воплощение этой идеи уйдет немало времени... и средств. Вы уверены в своих намерениях?"

languages.text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"
languages.original_text: "Это... крайне эксцентричная затея, Лорд-капитан. Идеально подходящая вашему титулу. Обязан предупредить, что на воплощение этой идеи уйдет немало времени... и средств. Вы уверены в своих намерениях?"

traits.locale_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

"This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

"This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

languages.text: "Das ... ist ein überaus exzentrisches Anliegen, Lord Captain. Ideal für eine Person Eurer erhabenen Stellung. Pflichtgemäß muss ich darauf hinweisen, dass diese Idee beträchtlich viel Zeit erfordern wird ... und Ressourcen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr das umsetzen wollt?"
languages.original_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

traits.locale_text: "Das ... ist ein überaus exzentrisches Anliegen, Lord Captain. Ideal für eine Person Eurer erhabenen Stellung. Pflichtgemäß muss ich darauf hinweisen, dass diese Idee beträchtlich viel Zeit erfordern wird ... und Ressourcen. Seid Ihr sicher, dass Ihr das umsetzen wollt?"

languages.text: « C'est un... projet plutôt original, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, digne d'une personne aussi noble que vous. Je dois cependant vous mettre en garde : sa réalisation va nécessiter un temps considérable... sans parler des ressources. Êtes-vous bien {mf|sûr|sûre} de vous ? »
languages.original_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

traits.locale_text: « C'est un... projet plutôt original, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, digne d'une personne aussi noble que vous. Je dois cependant vous mettre en garde : sa réalisation va nécessiter un temps considérable... sans parler des ressources. Êtes-vous bien {mf|sûr|sûre} de vous ? »

languages.text: “这……确实是一项古怪的工作，舰长大人，非常适合您这种位高权重的人。不过我有责任提醒您，如果想实现这个想法，需要投入大量的时间……与资源。您确定要实施这个计划吗？”
languages.original_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

traits.locale_text: “这……确实是一项古怪的工作，舰长大人，非常适合您这种位高权重的人。不过我有责任提醒您，如果想实现这个想法，需要投入大量的时间……与资源。您确定要实施这个计划吗？”

languages.text: 「それは…かなり風変わりな試みですな。あなた様のような高貴なご身分の方にはぴったりだ。仕事上警告させていただきますが、実行するにはかなりの時間と…資源がかかりますよ。本当によろしいのですね？」
languages.original_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

traits.locale_text: 「これは…かなり風変わりな試みですな、ロード・キャプテン。あなたのような高貴な御身分の方にはぴったりだ。私の責務として、このアイデアの実行にはかなりの時間と…資源がかかることをご警告させていただきます。本当によろしいのですね？」

languages.text: «Es... una petición un tanto excéntrica, Lord Capitán. Perfecta para una persona de su categoría. Pero debo advertirle que, para llevar a cabo esta idea, se requeriría una considerable inversión de tiempo... y recursos. ¿Seguro que es eso lo que quiere?».
languages.original_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

traits.locale_text: «Es... una petición un tanto excéntrica, Lord Capitán. Perfecta para una persona de su categoría. Pero debo advertirle que, para llevar a cabo esta idea, se requeriría una considerable inversión de tiempo... y recursos. ¿Seguro que es eso lo que quiere?».

languages.text: "Bu... Hayli alışılmadık bir girişim Lord Kaptan. Ancak sizin gibi yüce bir makama sahip birine yakışır. Bu fikri hayata geçirmenin kayda değer bir zaman ve... Kaynak yatırımı gerektireceği konusunda sizi uyarmam gerek. Maksadınızda kati misiniz?"
languages.original_text: "This... is a highly eccentric endeavour, Lord Captain. Perfect for a person of your lofty standing. It is my duty to warn you that implementing this idea will require a considerable investment of time... and resources. Are you sure of your intentions?"

traits.locale_text: "Bu... Hayli alışılmadık bir girişim Lord Kaptan. Sizin gibi yüce bir mevkiye sahip birine yakışır ancak. Bu fikri hayata geçirmenin kayda değer bir zaman ve... Kaynak yatırımı gerektireceği konusunda sizi uyarmam gerek. Maksadınızda kati misiniz?"
